about_the_game:
Your past is intricately woven into the present. You're not alone. Shared hardship and hope, but no time for doubt or inner conflict. The mission is paramount. Yet the embers of memory are still smoldering in your heart. Will you find the strength and courage to face and accept the truth?

#SHOOTER: Stay alert and shoot first. No allies here, only foes. Arm yourself with alien and human weaponry, modify and upgrade for survival.

#HORROR: Alien creatures and mutants roam the ruins and wastelands of a once-thriving planet. Lurking in dark corners, waiting for your slip, eager to breach your suit like a tin can.

#SURVIVAL: Develop, collect and use batteries, water, food and spare parts in the ruins of alien and human settlements. They will help you survive and deliver transport and cargo to your destination.

#TOWERDEFENSE: Use powerful weapons, your skilled hands, and brain to protect those you care about. Set up turrets, secure the perimeter during stops, and fend off attacks while on the move.

name: M.O.Z.I.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 6GB of dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Controller or keyboard + mouse.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 6GB of dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: SSD drive, Controller or keyboard + mouse

short_description: M.O.Z.I. - A post-apocalyptic FPS with elements of horror, survival and tower defense. Deadly Wasteland, Dying Planet: radiation, mutants, aliens and savages are all out to get you. Defend yourself, gather food and resources, and upgrade your equipment. Survive.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
